scene.hero: I wandered the lands for years after "that" incident. I eventually settled in the small province of Cindara and became one of the local residents in a short time. I have ran from my past til now. The gears have destiny have began to turn once again...
Tools...They are not for you obviously.
a wheel? do you think it could possibly be useful later on? maybse it could be useful to take with me

scene.guide: Welcome to the middle of nowhere!
